error.timeout: Connection to the API timed out.

user.description: Please enter your TechnitiumDNS API information.
user.title: Configure TechnitiumDNS

init.description: Enable DHCP device tracking to monitor devices connected to your Technitium DHCP server. Use IP filtering to control which devices are tracked based on their IP addresses.
init.title: TechnitiumDNS Options

dhcp_test.description: Results of the DHCP connection test. This shows all available DHCP leases from your Technitium DNS server.
dhcp_test.title: DHCP Connection Test Results

error.dhcp_error: DHCP API returned an error. Check your Technitium DNS server configuration.
error.dhcp_connection_failed: Failed to connect to DHCP API. Verify your server URL and token.
